flawed_nl_solution:
The cypress trees will earn Gloria 20 trees * $100/tree = $<<20*100=2000>>2000
From the sale of the cypress trees, Gloria will also make 600 trees * $200/tree = $<<600*200=120000>>120000
Finally, the maple trees will bring in 24 trees * $300/tree = $<<24*300=7200>>7200
Combining all the amounts will give Gloria a total of $150 + $2000 + $120000 + $7200 = $<<150+2000+120000+7200=129305>>129305
Subtracting the cost of the mountain cabin from the total will leave Gloria with a balance of $129305 - $129000 = $<<129305-129000=305>>305

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 129350, not 129305. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
